div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1624 Beth-Sahur, near Bethlehem, Judaea, 1946 Burial: 47-45 B.C. (Meshorer) Contents: 63 AE John Hyrcanus II Disposition: Jerusalem (Hebrew Univ.) Sukenik, JQR 1947, pp. 281-2 Kadman, INCJ, hoard 19 Meshorer, Jewish Coins of the Second Temple Period (Tel Aviv, 1967), pp. 50-2
